label: SOS
description: As needed (if required; single or repeated PRN doses per instruction).

label: ALTERNATE DAYS
description: Every other day (dose given on day 1,3,5,...).

label: AD/OD
description: Alternate day / once daily hybrid regimen (follow prescriber-specific schedule).

label: WEEKLY TWICE
description: Two times per week (e.g. every Monday and Thursday).

label: WEEKLY
description: Once per week (same day each week).

label: HOURLY
description: Every hour (24 doses per day unless limited).

label: 5 TIMES
description: Five times per day (approx every 4-5 hours while awake).

label: 6 TIMES
description: Six times per day (approx every 4 hours).

label: 5 DAYS PER WEEK
description: Five days each week (typically weekdays; no doses on two rest days).
